values.text: I didn't understand. You can try rephrasing.
Can you reword your statement? I'm not understanding.
I didn't get your meaning.
What genre do you prefer?
Which author are you looking for?
How are you feeling today?

generic.title: 🤖What would you like help with?
generic.description: 📚 Genre → I want to explore genres  😊 Mood → I feel...  📖 Reading Level → I am a beginner reader  🎲 Surprise Me → Surprise me

values.text: 🤖 Try The Midnight Library by Matt Haig — it’s thoughtful, inspiring, and universally loved.
👋 Bye for now! Happy reading — come back anytime for more book magic! 📚✨
📚 Until next time — happy reading!
🧡 Take care! Come back anytime for book magic.
🌟 Thanks for visiting! Let the stories stay with you.
👋 Bye-bye! May your bookshelf never be empty.
🧳 Off on a new adventure? Books await when you return!
🪄 See you soon — with more tales and twists!
📖 That’s a wrap for now. Come back when you're ready for your next chapter.
🕮 Catch you later! Don't forget to bookmark your favorites.
🧠 Go read something amazing. I'll be here when you're back!
👋 Goodbye! May your next read be unforgettable. 📖✨

📖 What’s your reading comfort level? Are you a beginner, prefer quick reads, or up for a challenge?
Let me know your level, and I’ll suggest the right books.
✨ Great! Try The Alchemist by Paulo Coelho — a timeless and inspiring read for every kind of reader.

description: A professional and clear name that combines "Read", "Mate" .
name: ReadMate
